suppress.notes: The CVE-2018-1258 occurs from spring security libraries, despite the latest versions are used. This is confirmed as false positive and hence it is suppressed (https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2952)
This CVE is related to file type tag parsing. However, the associated CVE seems to be a false positive on the lang-tag jar.
We are on latest version , these are coming form mvn:pkg
This CVE appears in the latest version of JSTL.
This CVE appears in the latest version of wiremock
This CWE occurs in the latest version of feign-core and feign-jackson
Transitive dependency of spring boot version
Jetty jar vulnerability 9.4.27 Need to suppress, This is transitive dependency coming from properties-volume-spring-boot-starter project which is under reform
Launch-darkley jar uses guava@28.2-jre as an internal library and it is not exposed outside. Since it cannot be upgraded, this supression is added.
This CVE is related to file type tag parsing. However, the associated CVE seems to be a false positive on the lang-tag jar.
spring-security jars cannot be upgraded, this supression is added.
